fields.name: Welcome
fields.subtitle: A tutorial
fields.description: Your task is straightforward yet crucial for laying a strong foundation in Python programming. You are required to write a Python script that does one simple but essential thing: prints the phrase "Hello PySect!" to the console.

fields.name: Addition
fields.subtitle: Sum two numbers
fields.description: In this challenge, your goal is to create a Python script that performs a fundamental operation: addition. You are tasked with writing a script that takes two integer values, adds them together, and prints the result to the console.
